price: 106. Kuwo kalena (oo ka haray jihaadka) waxaa dib loogu dhigay (arrinkooda) inay sugaan Amarka Alle, hadduu cadaabayo ama hadduu ka aqbalayo toobada. Allena waa wax kasta Ogsoone, Xakiim ah.
arabic: وَءَاخَرُونَ مُرۡجَوۡنَ لِأَمۡرِ ٱللَّهِ إِمَّا يُعَذِّبُهُمۡ وَإِمَّا يَتُوبُ عَلَيۡهِمۡۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waākharūna mur'jawna li-amri al-lahi immā yuʿadhibuhum wa-immā yatūbu ʿalayhim wal-lahu ʿalīmun ḥakīmun
